acupoint.standard_location: 在足内侧缘，当第一跖骨基底部的前下方
acupoint.standard_location_en: On the medial side of the foot, in the depression distal and inferior to the base of the 1st metatarsal bone
acupoint.simple_method: 足大趾内侧，沿足弓向后摸到第一跖骨底部隆起，其前下方凹陷处
acupoint.simple_method_en: On inner edge of foot, find the bump at base of big toe bone, then slightly forward and down into the depression.
acupoint.anatomical: 在拇展肌中；有足背静脉网，跗内侧动脉分支；布有隐神经及腓浅神经分支
functions: 健脾和胃 (strengthen spleen, harmonize stomach)
理气止痛 (regulate qi, relieve pain)
